messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] internet slang
messages.msgSnippet: How about this? http://penpals.englishclub.com/abbreviations.htm There are others too at google,  I just put in internet abbreviations. LOL means Laughing Out
messages.messageBody:
How about this?
http://penpals.englishclub.com/abbreviations.htm

There are others too at google, I just put in internet abbreviations.

LOL means Laughing Out Loud.

Here's another link too, for the emotions:
http://www.computeruser.com/resources/dictionary/emoticons.html

I was lost too at first.

Kelli~


----- Original Message -----
From: cheryledstrom
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, January 18, 2004 11:23 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] internet slang


I just wanted to know if there is someplace i can go to learn what
all the abbreviated text messaging type lingo means. i am new at
this, but i see the same abbreviations again and again, and have no
idea what they mean. For instance, "LOL". Can somebody enlighten me
on this?
